import React from 'react'; import Slider from "react-slick"; import "../App.css"; // 请在 src/assets/images/ 下放置对应的轮播图图片（banner1.jpg、banner2.jpg、banner3.jpg） import banner1 from "../assets/images/banner1.jpg"; import banner2 from "../assets/images/banner2.jpg"; import banner3 from "../assets/images/banner3.jpg"; function Home() { // 轮播图设置，增加 fade 效果 const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 1000, fade: true, // 淡入淡出效果 autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 3000, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, arrows: false // 隐藏左右箭头 }; return (
{/* 轮播图区域 */}
{/* 页面内容区域 */}

Welcome to Shundao

We are a global leader in color spun yarn and sustainable textile solutions. Our commitment to innovation and environmental responsibility sets us apart.

Brand Advantage

Our brand stands for cutting-edge technology, sustainability, and exceptional quality. We continuously invest in innovative solutions to stay ahead in the industry.

Main Products

Our product range includes premium color spun yarns, eco-friendly recycled cotton yarns, and more, designed to meet modern demands for fashion and sustainability.

{/* 此处预留产品展示区域 */}
); } export default Home;
